Poor translation kinda ruins the mood, For me it's a great part of the ntr doujins, but still it's useful ty ;)

Thumbnail: B- | Depends on how much time you've spent on this site you 'should' know what honor student aesthetic means for the story, but it's not clickbaity enough for porn.
Story : C | The whole "money problem" plot has been done before and this one isn't really anything speceial except for the funds being used for a wedding, which doesn't end up to being a big part of the plot anyway.
Panels: A+ | Great balance between the depiction of the action, story and the facial expressions, which makes the second half of this manga actually really good compared to the slow first half.
Overall : B- , better ntr has been made before, but this one isn't that bad.
The translation could really use some editing.
